meanings.definition: A shortened form of a word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: An abbreviation like 'Mr.' makes writing faster.
meanings.sent2: I used the abbreviation 'etc.' to show there are more examples.
meanings.sent3: The abbreviation 'LOL' always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her nickname was an abbreviation for her full name.
meanings.sent5: Remember the abbreviation 'ASAP' for 'as soon as possible'.

meanings.sent1: His abbreviation of the speech made it more concise.
meanings.sent2: The abbreviation of the document saved time and space.
meanings.sent3: The abbreviation of the recipe left out the best part!
meanings.sent4: Her abbreviation of the story left out important details.
meanings.sent5: The abbreviation of the meeting made it more efficient.
